name: Dekis
description:
At the start of the game you’ll see squares in two colours. The goal of the game is to turn them all dark. Tap on a square to change the colour of the adjacent ones indicated by the arrows.The tapped square itself will also change if it has a little dot in the centre.

With DEKIS you can:

  • Play a new challenge every day.
  • Access the previous daily challenges to improve your scores.
  • Share your scores on social networks.

This game is free for 4X4 square boards and you will have access only to the challenges of the current month.

In the mobile versions and by making a single small payment you will have access to:

  • 3X3, 5X5 and 6X6 boards.
  • Possibility to change the colors of the game.
  • Access to all boards from January 1, 2022.

DEKIS is the brother puzzle of EKIS. also by designed NestorGames and implemented by Garaje Imagina that adds up to our series of fun metal challenges.
